title: correct Restore to account for missing Calls
message:
correct Restore to account for missing Calls

if a user had removed a Call, then when we tried to restore the RVs/placements for that deleted call, if would just assign them to the old ID (which causes conflicts). 

Now, when an ID is encountered that we don't have, we create and then delete a new Call, and use that throw-away ID.

removed Element.setTextContent

title: sets alarm for 1st of the month, at 5pm. if its already the first, use the same…
message:
sets alarm for 1st of the month, at 5pm. if its already the first, use the same day, otherwise, schedule for the next month.

Also adding a boot receiver, so we can schedule the alarm if the user restarts their phone. requires a new permission, though.
